data.message: My son has an old facebook acccount that he hasn't used in years.  He want to permanently delete it--old stuff on there he doesn't want to be reminded of.  He no longer has the email account that is associated with the facebook account so he has not been able to access to facebook account to delete it.  Can you help, please?

replies.message: Hey Mary. You can learn how to remove or recover an old account you can't log into here: http://bit.ly/2m0zKVy. Please keep in mind that it's against our Community Standards to maintain more than one personal account. -Zack
